languages.text: {n}После тягостного хронооборота молчания Паскаль наконец изрекает.{/n} "Фиксирую акт... святоподражания. Данная культурная особенность характерна для отсталых племен. Прогнозирую также наличие наскальных пиктограмм, посвященных божественному явлению более высокоразвитых единиц".

traits.locale_text: {n}После тягостного хронооборота молчания Паскаль наконец изрекает.{/n} "Фиксирую акт... святоподражания. Данная культурная особенность характерна для племен эпохи терра-неолита. Прогнозирую также наличие наскальных пиктограмм, посвященных божественному явлению более высокоразвитых единиц".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}After a chrono-turn of heavy silence, Pasqal finally intones,{/n} "I am registering an act of... imitation of sanctity. This cultural phenomenon is typical of underdeveloped tribes. I also anticipate the discovery of cave pictograms dedicated to the divine arrival of the more advanced units."
languages.original_text: {n}После тягостного хронооборота молчания Паскаль наконец изрекает.{/n} "Фиксирую акт... святоподражания. Данная культурная особенность характерна для отсталых племен. Прогнозирую также наличие наскальных пиктограмм, посвященных божественному явлению более высокоразвитых единиц".

traits.locale_text: {n}After a chrono-turn of heavy silence, Pasqal finally utters,{/n} "I am registering an act of... imitation of sanctity. This cultural phenomenon is typical of underdeveloped tribes. I also predict the discovery of cave pictograms dedicated to the divine arrival of the more advanced units."
{n}Pasqual's visor starts flashing red, but by some miracle the Tech-Priest keeps his comments to himself.{/n}

{n}After a chrono-turn of heavy silence, Pasqal finally intones,{/n} "I am registering an act of... imitation of sanctity. This cultural phenomenon is typical of underdeveloped tribes. I also anticipate the discovery of cave pictograms dedicated to the divine arrival of the more advanced units."

{n}After a chrono-turn of heavy silence, Pasqal finally utters,{/n} "I am registering an act of... imitation of sanctity. This cultural phenomenon is typical of underdeveloped tribes. I also predict the discovery of cave pictograms dedicated to the divine arrival of the more advanced units."

{n}After a chrono-turn of heavy silence, Pasqal finally intones,{/n} "I am registering an act of... imitation of sanctity. This cultural phenomenon is typical of underdeveloped tribes. I also anticipate the discovery of cave pictograms dedicated to the divine arrival of the more advanced units."

languages.text: {n}一阵沉重的静默之后，帕斯卡终于吟诵着开了口。{/n}“检测到……模仿神圣造物的行为，这样的文化现象在落后区域的部落中非常典型。本单位预测，后续还会在洞窟之中发现视讯图像，内容为：预言更加先进的单位降临在这个世界。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a chrono-turn of heavy silence, Pasqal finally intones,{/n} "I am registering an act of... imitation of sanctity. This cultural phenomenon is typical of underdeveloped tribes. I also anticipate the discovery of cave pictograms dedicated to the divine arrival of the more advanced units."

traits.locale_text: {n}一阵沉重的静默之后，帕斯卡终于吟诵着开了口。{/n}“检测到……模仿神圣造物的行为，这样的文化现象在落后区域的部落中非常典型。本单位预测，后续还会在洞窟之中发现视讯图像，内容为：预言更加先进的单位降临在这个世界。”

languages.text: {n}一瞬の重苦しい沈黙の後、パスカルはついに声を発した。{/n}「サンクティティの…模倣行為を記録中。この文化的現象は、未発達な部族に典型的に見られるものです。より高度なユニットの神聖なる到来を描いた洞窟壁画の発見も予想されます」
languages.original_text: {n}After a chrono-turn of heavy silence, Pasqal finally intones,{/n} "I am registering an act of... imitation of sanctity. This cultural phenomenon is typical of underdeveloped tribes. I also anticipate the discovery of cave pictograms dedicated to the divine arrival of the more advanced units."

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬の重苦しい沈黙の後、パスカルはついに声を発した。{/n}「サンクティティの…模倣行為を記録中。この文化的現象は、未発達な部族に典型的に見られるものです。より高度なユニットの神聖なる到来を描いた洞窟壁画の発見も予想されます」

languages.text: {n}Después de un cronoturno de ominoso silencio, Pasqal entona por fin:{/n} «Registro un acto de... imitación de santidad. Este fenómeno cultural es típico de las tribus subdesarrolladas. También anticipo el descubrimiento de pictogramas rupestres dedicados a la llegada divina de las unidades más avanzadas».
languages.original_text: {n}After a chrono-turn of heavy silence, Pasqal finally intones,{/n} "I am registering an act of... imitation of sanctity. This cultural phenomenon is typical of underdeveloped tribes. I also anticipate the discovery of cave pictograms dedicated to the divine arrival of the more advanced units."

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de un cronoturno de ominoso silencio, Pasqal entona por fin:{/n} «Registro un acto de... imitación de santidad. Este fenómeno cultural es típico de las tribus subdesarrolladas. También anticipo el descubrimiento de pictogramas rupestres dedicados a la llegada divina de las unidades más avanzadas».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, bir kronodevir süren ağır sessizliğin ardından nihayet mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Bir kutsallık taklidi eylemi kaydediyorum. Bu kültürel fenomen, az gelişmiş kabilelere özgüdür. Ayrıca daha gelişmiş birimlerin ilahi gelişimine adanmış mağara piktogramlarının keşfini de öngörüyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}After a chrono-turn of heavy silence, Pasqal finally intones,{/n} "I am registering an act of... imitation of sanctity. This cultural phenomenon is typical of underdeveloped tribes. I also anticipate the discovery of cave pictograms dedicated to the divine arrival of the more advanced units."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir kronodevir süren ağır sessizliğin ardından Pasqal nihayet mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Bir kutsallık taklidi eylemi kaydediyorum. Bu kültürel fenomen, az gelişmiş kabilelere özgüdür. Ayrıca daha gelişmiş birimlerin ilahi gelişimine adanmış mağara piktogramlarının keşfini de öngörüyorum."

languages.text: {n}Au bout d'un chrono-cycle de silence de mort, Pasqal déclare :{/n} « Je relève un acte... d'imitation de piété. Ce phénomène culturel est typique des tribus sous-développées. J'anticipe ainsi également la présence de pictogrammes rupestres décrivant l'arrivée divine d'unités plus avancées. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a chrono-turn of heavy silence, Pasqal finally intones,{/n} "I am registering an act of... imitation of sanctity. This cultural phenomenon is typical of underdeveloped tribes. I also anticipate the discovery of cave pictograms dedicated to the divine arrival of the more advanced units."

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout d'un chrono-cycle de silence de mort, Pasqal déclare :{/n} « Je relève un acte... d'imitation de piété. Ce phénomène culturel est typique des tribus sous-développées. J'anticipe ainsi également la présence de pictogrammes rupestres décrivant l'arrivée divine d'unités plus avancées. »

languages.text: {n}Nach einer Chrono-Umdrehung bleierner Stille sagt Pasqal schließlich:{/n} "Ich registriere einen Akt der ... Imitation von Heiligkeit. Dieses kulturelle Phänomen ist typisch für unterentwickelte Stämme. Ich ahne zudem die Entdeckung von Höhlenpiktogrammen voraus, die der göttlichen Ankunft höher entwickelter Einheiten gewidmet sind."
languages.original_text: {n}After a chrono-turn of heavy silence, Pasqal finally intones,{/n} "I am registering an act of... imitation of sanctity. This cultural phenomenon is typical of underdeveloped tribes. I also anticipate the discovery of cave pictograms dedicated to the divine arrival of the more advanced units."

Dieses kulturelle Phänomen ist typisch für unterentwickelte Stämme. Ich ahne zudem die Entdeckung von Höhlenpiktogrammen voraus, die der göttlichen Ankunft höher entwickelter Einheiten gewidmet sind."
